text: Valley of the Dolls is a 1967 American drama movie directed by Mark Robson and based on the 1966 novel of the same name by Jacqueline Susann. It stars Barbara Parkins, Patty Duke, Sharon Tate, Susan Hayward and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Other websites == * * * Category:1967 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mark Robson Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Valley of the Dolls (movie)
